definitions.title: 1. f.
definitions.body: daughter of Ṣelophehad of Gilead Nu 26:33, Nu 27:1, Nu 36:11, Jos 17:3; Qersa.

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: old Can. city Jos 12:24, early cap. of N. Isr. (until Omri) 1Ki 14:17 ([[תִּרְחָ֫תָה]]), 1Ki 15:21, 1Ki 15:33, 1Ki 16:6, 1Ki 16:8, 1Ki 16:9, 1Ki 16:9, 1Ki 16:15, 1Ki 16:17, 1Ki 16:23, Qarsa, usu. Qersa; Menahem’s base of operations 2Ki 15:14; 2Ki 15:16 (Qars(e)ila v:2Ki 15:14, Euseb:Onom. 263, 62, ed. Lag cp. Qarsila, village of Samaritans in Batanea, and Buhl:Geogr. 247 conj. Tesîl, 20 m. E. of Lake Gennesaret, but this too remote); in sim. of beauty (om. LXX) Ct So 6:4 (‖[[יְרוּשָׁלַם ]]);—site not certain; conj, are: Tallûza, just N. of Mt. Ebal (Rob:BR iii. 302 f.), Tayaṣir, c. 10 m. further NE., > eṭ-Ṭîre, S. of Gerizim (see, on these, GASm:Geogr. 355 Buhl:Geogr. 203 Aglen:Hast. DB. s. v.).
